```{r}
#| class: webex-box
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
question <- "What package can be used to create interactive plots in R?"
question_choices <- c(
    "`ggplot2`", 
    "`base`", 
    answer = "`plotly`", 
    "`dplyr`"
)
cat(question, longmcq(sample(question_choices)))
```
